EmailTemplate.subject: Check out Honeywell’s DU-875 Displays In Action!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Want to see the DU-875 display in action?
Click below to watch Joey Meier, pilot and spotter for NASCAR champion Brad Keselowski, showcase the features of Primus Elite and the benefits provided by Honeywell's brighter, clearer, high-resolution DU-875 displays. And, as you finalize your aircraft budget for 2020, don’t forget to include your Primus Elite or DU-875 one-for-one upgrade so you can fly with the clearest views and latest technology!
WATCH NOW! <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nJlfjINrFIQ]]>
Contact Pentastar Aviation to learn more or schedule your installation.
